section10.Title: Your personal address in the UK for purchases
section10.text1: With us, you get two addresses in UK! We have two warehouses for receiving parcels - in London and Manchester. Indicate in the store the one that will be cheaper (or the purchase will be without taxes).In total, in London, our clients order clothes and shoes, and gadgets go to Manchester and everything else.
section10.text2: When delivering from UK to Russia, all your goods are sure to insure. Reception of parcels on our warehouse, their processing, removing extra boxes, storage for up to 70 days - we have completely free. We also carry out the combination of parcels from different stores for freeOne thing.
section10.text3: We have the most profitable delivery! From $ 11.99 for the package! And if you have any special requirements, such as checking equipment or additional film for the most fragile goods, the operators of our warehouse will be happy to perform them on special trial.
section10.text4: Okeypost.com is reliable, quickly and profitable. And in our social networks you will always find information about the best FyukBQCRB discounts [shops.
